description:
###Administrative boundaries utilized to conduct Kiribati 2018 Household Listing  
* Enumeration area boundaries: specific geographic units used for statistical data collection.
* Village boundaries
* Island boundaries. Layer represented with a 25km buffer from the coast to improve the data representation visibility. 

These administrative boundaries have been used to build the Kiribati PopGIS3 online mapping tool https://kiribati.popgis.spc.int/. To know more about the PopGIS project please see http://sdd.spc.int/mapping-popgis

###Disclaimer: 
Upper level administrative units may slightly differ from the official boundaries. The boundaries, codes and names shown in the datasets do not imply official endorsement or acceptance by SPC.
name: 2018_Kiribati_HHL_Admin_Boundaries
